lines.text:
[voiceover]
Niilo Kalevi Rotko! He was able to get every bitch he wanted -and their money!

[Anita is dancing with a middle-aged man in the bar]
What's the most terrible, is that my wife doesn't understand me at all. I'm on a business-trip at the moment. But my wife doesn't appreciate it at all. Would it be better if I were unemployed and stayed home all the time? In the matter of fact it is a miracle that any marriage survives in this specificated society of ours.

[voice over]
It would have been a routine-arrest, if the gun hadn't been there.

[Härkönen enters the bar]
All right, it's time for the light signal!
It's not even half past eleven!
In the matter of fact it is quarter past eleven, but you're coming with me?
What am I charged with now?

[to the bar customers]
All right, let's go home now! The bar is closed!
